mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM CRD_SERV_APP SER, CRD_SERV_SUGG SUG WHERE SER.SERV_ID = SUG.SERV_ID AND SUG.MEM_ID= #{memId} AND (CHOOSE_YN = 'N' OR CHOOSE_YN IS NULL)

SELECT SUGG_ID, NAME,SUGG_DATE, CHOOSE_YN, PER_BUD, SERV_DATE FROM ( SELECT A.*,ROWNUM AS NUM FROM ( SELECT SUGG_ID ,(SELECT NAME FROM CRD_MEM WHERE MEM_ID =SER.CUSTOMER_ID) AS NAME ,TO_CHAR(SUGG_DATE,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS SUGG_DATE, CHOOSE_YN , SUG.PER_BUD,TO_CHAR(SERV_DATE ,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS SERV_DATE FROM CRD_SERV_APP SER, CRD_SERV_SUGG SUG WHERE SER.SERV_ID = SUG.SERV_ID AND SUG.MEM_ID= #{memId} AND (CHOOSE_YN = 'N' OR CHOOSE_YN IS NULL) ORDER BY SUGG_DATE DESC ) A )WHERE NUM BETWEEN #{startNum} AND #{endNum}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM CRD_SERV_APP SER, CRD_SERV_SUGG SUG WHERE SER.SERV_ID = SUG.SERV_ID AND SUG.MEM_ID= #{memId} AND SER.PROGRESS_CODE IN ('STU0030001','STU0030002','STU0030003') AND CHOOSE_YN = 'Y'

SELECT SUGG_ID, NAME,SUGG_DATE, PER_BUD, SERV_DATE, CHOOSE_DATE, PARTICIPANT FROM ( SELECT A.*,ROWNUM AS NUM FROM ( SELECT SUGG_ID ,(SELECT NAME FROM CRD_MEM WHERE MEM_ID =SER.CUSTOMER_ID) AS NAME ,TO_CHAR(SUGG_DATE,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS SUGG_DATE , SUG.PER_BUD ,TO_CHAR(SERV_DATE ,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS SERV_DATE ,TO_CHAR(CHOOSE_DATE,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS CHOOSE_DATE ,PARTICIPANT FROM CRD_SERV_APP SER, CRD_SERV_SUGG SUG WHERE SER.SERV_ID = SUG.SERV_ID AND SUG.MEM_ID= #{memId} AND CHOOSE_YN = 'Y' AND SER.PROGRESS_CODE IN ('STU0030001','STU0030002','STU0030003') ORDER BY SUGG_DATE DESC ) A )WHERE NUM BETWEEN #{startNum} AND #{endNum}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM CRD_SERV_APP APP,CRD_SERV_SUGG SUG WHERE APP.SERV_ID = SUG.SERV_ID AND PROGRESS_CODE ='STU0040001' AND CHOOSE_YN ='Y' AND MEM_ID =#{memId}

SELECT NAME,SUGG_ID,SUGG_DATE,PARTICIPANT, SERV_DATE,ADDR FROM ( SELECT A.*,ROWNUM AS NUM FROM ( SELECT (SELECT NAME FROM CRD_MEM WHERE MEM_ID = APP.CUSTOMER_ID) AS NAME ,TO_CHAR(SUGG_DATE,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS SUGG_DATE ,SUGG_ID ,PARTICIPANT ,TO_CHAR(SERV_DATE ,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS SERV_DATE ,ADDRESS || ADDRESS_DETAIL AS ADDR FROM CRD_SERV_APP APP,CRD_SERV_SUGG SUG WHERE APP.SERV_ID = SUG.SERV_ID AND PROGRESS_CODE ='STU0040001' AND CHOOSE_YN ='Y' AND MEM_ID =#{memId} ORDER BY SERV_DATE ASC ) A )WHERE NUM BETWEEN #{startNum} AND #{endNum}

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM CRD_SERV_APP APP,CRD_SERV_SUGG SUG, CRD_SHIP SHIP WHERE APP.SERV_ID = SUG.SERV_ID AND APP.SERV_ID = SHIP.SERV_ID AND PROGRESS_CODE IN('STU0050001','STU0050002') AND CHOOSE_YN ='Y' AND MEM_ID =#{memId}

SELECT NAME, SUGG_DATE, SUGG_ID, SERV_DATE, START_DATE, ADDR, PROGRESS_CODE FROM ( SELECT A.*,ROWNUM AS NUM FROM ( SELECT (SELECT NAME FROM CRD_MEM WHERE MEM_ID = APP.CUSTOMER_ID) AS NAME ,TO_CHAR(SUGG_DATE,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS SUGG_DATE ,SUGG_ID ,TO_CHAR(SERV_DATE ,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS SERV_DATE ,TO_CHAR(SHIP.START_DATE,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS START_DATE ,ADDRESS || ADDRESS_DETAIL AS ADDR ,PROGRESS_CODE FROM CRD_SERV_APP APP,CRD_SERV_SUGG SUG, CRD_SHIP SHIP WHERE APP.SERV_ID = SUG.SERV_ID AND APP.SERV_ID = SHIP.SERV_ID AND PROGRESS_CODE IN('STU0050001','STU0050002') AND CHOOSE_YN ='Y' AND MEM_ID =#{memId} ORDER BY SERV_DATE ASC ) A )WHERE NUM BETWEEN #{startNum} AND #{endNum}

SELECT APP.SERV_ID as SERV_ID , (SELECT NAME FROM CRD_MEM WHERE MEM_ID =APP.CUSTOMER_ID) AS NAME , (SELECT TEL FROM CRD_MEM WHERE MEM_ID =APP.CUSTOMER_ID) AS TEL , TO_CHAR(SUGG_DATE,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS SUGG_DATE, CHOOSE_YN , SUGG.PER_BUD,TO_CHAR(SERV_DATE ,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS SERV_DATE , PROGRESS_CODE , PARTICIPANT , ZIPCODE , ADDRESS , ADDRESS_DETAIL , AGE_MIN , AGE_MAX , PER_MEN , SERV_TYPE_CODE , EVENT_TYPE_CODE , DESSERT_YN , INTERIOR_YN , COOKING_YN , DISCHARGE_YN , PARKING_YN , TABLEWARE_YN , ELEVATOR_YN , COORDINATOR_YN , OTHER_ORDER_YN , REQUESTED_TERM FROM CRD_SERV_SUGG SUGG, CRD_SERV_APP APP WHERE SUGG.SERV_ID = APP.SERV_ID AND SUGG.SUGG_ID = #{suggId}
SELECT MENU_SEQ , NAME , WEIGHT , EXPLANATION , FILE_ID FROM CRD_SERV_SUGG_MENU WHERE SUGG_ID = #{suggId}
